Html:
Hi,

I noticed some things with the Ribbon that I think might be bugs:

1. When I use the mouse wheel to switch to a different RibbonTab, the controls on the tab are disabled until I click the tab (or anywhere on the area where RibbonGroups are.)

2. When the window is maximized, the top of the application menu button and QAT buttons are clipped off because they go off the screen.

Could you let me know if these things are going to be fixed by V1, or if I will need to try to find a way to fix it myself?

Thanks,
Alex

Hi Alex,

The first one sounds like a command or focus routing issue.  We've had a lot of these reported and they should be fixed in V1.

The second one is a known issue and will be fixed in V1.

Thanks!
Samantha

OK - I'll be looking forward to V1 then.

Thanks,
Alex
